title: Tranquil Southern Highlands Peppers Escape with Dining Credit & Daily Breakfast
description:
Find adventure and classic comforts tucked away within the New South Wales Southern Highlands with a rejuvenating retreat at the charming Peppers Craigieburn Bowral. Exchange city crowds for hundred-year-old trees with an indulgent escape at this peaceful property. Steeped in history, unwind against the backdrop of breathtaking gardens, a 100-year-old golf course and - the star of the show - a beautiful heritage building with two wings bursting with country charm.

Within driving distance of Sydney, Canberra and the South Coast, Peppers Craigieburn Bowral invites guests to venture inwards, leave the chaos of the city behind and immerse themselves in a truly tranquil trip. Alongside quality moments for relaxation serviced by the hotel’s dedicated and passionate staff, there’s also plenty of opportunity for excitement from playing friendly tennis matches to enjoying a nightcap around the billiards table.
offer_address: Centennial Road, Bowral, 2576, New South Wales, Australia

title: Romantic Southern Highlands Peppers Escape with Wine Tasting
description:
Escape to New South Wales’ Southern Highlands for a romantic retreat at the charming Peppers Craigieburn. Steeped in history, this peaceful property near Bowral offers beautiful grounds, a 100-year-old golf course and comfortable rooms with countryside allure. Embrace the tranquillity with a bottle of wine on arrival, a round of golf for two, a wine tasting at a local vineyard, a 20% discount on Peppers' signature High Tea (see 'Fine Print' for details), A$40 food and drink credit (minimum A$100 spend) and a leisurely late 12pm checkout.

**Breakfast Upgrade:** Start your day in this scenic part of NSW with a sumptuous breakfast when you upgrade to a Breakfast Package or to a beautiful Elms Balcony Room.

title: Idyllic Southern Highlands Escape just 90-Minutes from Sydney with Daily Breakfast
description:
A modern countryside adventure awaits at this newly refurbished retreat - formerly the acclaimed Gibraltar Hotel in Bowral. Now at the helm of the Park Proxi brand, this much-loved gem delivers a premium service synonymous with the name in a coveted and history-rich location.

Settle into a world of tranquillity within the Southern Highlands, just a scenic 90-minute drive from Sydney or Canberra. Unwind in style by the sparkling indoor pool or tee off at the 18-hole golf course right on your doorstep. When hunger strikes, enjoy an array of Asian-inspired dishes against panoramic views of the fairway and surrounding bushlands at Lotus Bowral - providing sumptuous breakfast, lunch and dinner with an extensive wine list.

Treat your palette to a signature martini or craft beer at Harvey's Bar where the chairs are plush, the cocktail menu is impressive and live music often fills the room. Throughout your stay, discover the allure of Bowral, with its historic landmarks and quaint charm, just moments from your retreat.
offer_address: 7 Boronia Street, Bowral, New South Wales 2576, Australia

title: Secluded Southern Highlands Cottage Luxury for up to 6 Adults with Hot Tub & Welcome Wine
description:
Escape to the country with friends and indulge in an exclusive, secluded retreat at the newly renovated, adults-only Hall House - a luxury three-bedroom cottage in the heart of the Southern Highlands, less than two hours' drive from Sydney and Canberra.

Offering everything you need for your home-away-from-home, this stylishly appointed abode features a fully equipped kitchen, indoor and outdoor dining areas, luxurious oversized beds, rain showers and a brand new, ultra-luxe six-seater heated hydrotherapy spa.

Perfectly located a short stroll from Bowral's antique shops and gourmet restaurants, across the road from Bowral Golf Club, and a short drive away from Centennial Vineyards and the stunning nature trails of the Southern Highlands, days can be spent sampling local tipples, bushwalking through the countryside or relaxing with a round of golf before retreating to your private home to spend quality time with friends.

title: Peppers Countryside Romance in the Southern Highlands
description: Escape to the tranquility of New South Wales’ Southern Highlands with a stay at Peppers Craigieburn. Steeped in history, this peaceful property near Bowral offers beautiful grounds, a 100-year-old golf course and comfortable rooms with countryside charm. Included in your escape is a bottle of wine on arrival, a round of golf for two, a wine tasting at a local vineyard and AUD$40 food and beverage credit to use towards dining at the on-site Hickory’s restaurant.

vendor_name: Milton Park Country House Hotel & Spa
title: NSW Southern Highlands Country Estate Luxury with Daily Breakfast & High Tea Experience
description:
Fall in love at first sight with boutique Southern Highlands retreat Milton Park Country House Hotel & Spa, offering French Provencal-inspired grandeur, old-world hospitality and Australia’s most remarkable private gardens, all just a two-hour drive from Sydney. Blurring the lines between chateau and chic, this magnificent hotel boasts just 44 rooms - each featuring wonderful views over the flawless estate grounds or surrounding pine forest, with every last detail meticulously fashioned to provide an unrivalled romantic stay. Take one of New South Wales’ best high teas on The Terrace, savour charcuterie and classic cocktails at The Polo Bar or savour an ambient fine dining experience at the estate’s signature establishment, Hordens Restaurant.

Immortalised in television, Milton Park Country House Hotel & Spa’s gardens are the only work of the English School of Landscape to be produced outside of Europe. As you wander past floral rose bushes, gently swaying cypresses, bright rhododendrons, whispering fountains and the oldest weeping beeches in Australia, you will discover something precious: the tranquillity of a garden beyond compare. Return from your amblings to world-class treatments at the Wellness Spa, another true bastion of European-inspired calm.
location_description: Milton Park Country House Hotel & Spa
offer_address: 200 Horderns Road, Bowral 2576, New South Wales, Australia

title: Relaxing Golf and Gourmet Break
description: Escape the city for the countryside of the Southern Highlands, with a weekday boutique break in exclusive Bowral. Indulge in gourmet cuisine, relax at the day spa and while away your days on the golf course at Gibraltar Hotel Bowral, located in the heart of the town close to wineries, galleries and more. Your escape includes daily cooked breakfast, an AU$25 spa credit each, two-for-one green fees, a welcome drink each on arrival and guaranteed late checkout at 12pm.

title: Idyllic Southern Highlands Heritage Retreat with Private Golf Course & Onsite Restaurant
description: Experience the majestic charms of the Southern Highlands with a luxe stay at this grandly refurbished heritage retreat in scenic Bowral. Bask in the old-world elegance of this tranquil retreat, surrounded by a nine-hole golf course and manicured gardens and easily reachable from Sydney, Canberra and the South Coast. Feast on local produce and a seasonally rotating menu at the onsite Hickory's Restaurant and Bar, or hop in the car to visit the region's renowned cool-climate wineries, only a short drive away.
